company.name: Square Enix Creative Business Unit III

name: Final Fantasy XIV: Complete Collector's Edition
summary:
For players who are new to Final Fantasy XIV Online, this bundle is the most comprehensive package and includes:

Final Fantasy XIV: A Realm Reborn
Create your own unique FINAL FANTASY hero and begin your adventures in the realm of Eorzea!

Final Fantasy XIV: Heavensward
Take to the skies and bring an end to the thousand-year Dragonsong War and restore light to the realm in this critically-acclaimed expansion.

Final Fantasy XIV: Stormblood
Join the fight for freedom! Journey to the East to explore vast, new lands and play as two additional jobs ─ Red Mage and Samurai.

Final Fantasy XIV: Shadowbringers
Become the Darkness! Journey to the First and play as two new jobs - Gunbreaker and Dancer - as well as two new races - Viera and Hrothgar.

Final Fantasy XIV: Endwalker
Journey to the very stars above in the latest expansion! Begin the next chapter and play as two new jobs - Sage and Reaper - as well as a new race - male Viera.

In-game bonus items from all Collector's Editions - the base game and all expansions through Endwalker
